General.Name: Elgeka S.A
General.Description: Elgeka S.A. operates in the food sector primarily in Greece. The company trades in food and other consumer products; and provides logistics services, as well as storage, distribution, and repackaging services. It also offers real estate management services; and provides medical information services. Elgeka S.A. was founded in 1974 and is based in Thessaloniki, Greece.
General.Address: Industrial Area of Sindos, Thessaloniki, Greece, 570 22
